params._poolId: The pool to enable Aave for

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

aaveConfigs(address).notice: Get Aave configuration for a token

claimAaveRewards(bytes32).notice: Claim Aave rewards for a specific pool

configureAave(address,address,address,ad.notice: Configure Aave integration for a specific token

enableAaveForPool(bytes32).notice: Enable Aave integration for an existing pool

getPoolAaveBalance(bytes32).notice: Get current Aave balance for a pool (including yield)

getPoolYield(bytes32).notice: Get total yield earned from Aave for a pool

getSavingPoolByIndex(bytes32).notice: Get saving pool details by index

getSavingPoolBySaver(address).notice: Get all saving pools for a specific saver

isAaveConfigured(address).notice: Check if Aave is configured for a token

openSavingPool(address,uint256,string,ui.notice: Allow Opening a saving pool with initial contribution (without Aave integration)

poolSavingPool(bytes32).notice: Get saving pool by pool ID

supportsMetaTransactions().notice: Check if contract supports meta transactions

totalAaveDeposits(address).notice: Get total Aave deposits for a token

updateSaving(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allow adding funds to an existing saving pool

userContributedPools(address,uint256).notice: Get user contributed pools by index

withdraw(bytes32).notice: Enhanced withdraw function with Aave integration
